title: What kind of technologies could potientally replace CMOS circuits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Beyond CMOS (Wikipedia) has a list of technologies that have been investigated : Some areas of investigation tunnel junction devices, eg Tunnel field-effect transistor[10]indium antimonide transistorscarbon nanotube FET, eg CNT Tunnel field-effect transistorgraphene nanoribbonsmolecular electronicsspintronics — many variantsfuture low-energy electronics technologies, ultra-low dissipation conduction paths, includingtopological materialsexciton superfluidsphotonics and optical computingsuperconducting computingrapid single-flux quantum (RSFQ)
A lot of researches and initiatives are on going for semiconductor applications.. It is very possible for the CMOS technology conversion into the Nanotechnology level be the next major development..
